org.epics.pvData.pvCopy
Class PVShareFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.epics.pvData.pvCopy.PVShareFactory

public class PVShareFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Create a PVField that shares the data from another PVField. The original pvField is replaced by the newlt created PVField.

Author:
mrk

Constructor Summary
PVShareFactory()
           
 
Method Summary
static PVArray replace(PVArray pvNow, PVArray pvShare)
          Replace pvNow with an implementation that shares the data from pvShare.
static PVScalar replace(PVScalar pvNow, PVScalar pvShare)
          Replace pvNow with an implementation that shares the data from pvShare.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

PVShareFactory

public PVShareFactory()
Method Detail

replace

public static PVScalar replace(PVScalar pvNow,
                               PVScalar pvShare)
Replace pvNow with an implementation that shares the data from pvShare. The original pvNow is replaced with the new implementation. When a get of put is made to the new PVField the get or put method of the shared PVField is called.

Parameters:
pvNow - The original PVScalar to replace.
pvShare - The field from which data will be shared.
Returns:
The newly created PVScalar.

replace

public static PVArray replace(PVArray pvNow,
                              PVArray pvShare)
Replace pvNow with an implementation that shares the data from pvShare. The original pvNow is replaced with the new implementation. When a get of put is made to the new PVField the get or put method of the shared PVField is called.

Parameters:
pvNow - The original PVScalar to replace.
pvShare - The field from which data will be shared.
Returns:
The newly created PVScalar.
